This one is tricky, and in my opinion the biggest threat to new vegans. Vitamin B12 only occurs naturally in meat. However, thanks to advancements in modern science, the vitamin can be created artificially in a laboratory and reproduced in pill form. You may be skeptical to ingest something made in a lab, but vitamin B12 supplements shouldnâ€™t be viewed any differently than daily multivitamins, fish oil, or other common supplements.
